text:
For Users with accounts in the Be Software International Australian Data Region, Be Software International processes data solely in data centres located in Australia.
For Users with accounts in the Be Software International Canada Data Region, Be Software International processes data solely in data centers located in Canada.
For Users with accounts in the Be Software International Singapore Data Region, Be Software International processes data solely in data centres located in Singapore.
For Users with accounts in the Be Software International US Data Region, Be Software International processes data solely in data centres located in the US.
For users with accounts in the Be Software International United Kingdom Data Region, Be Software International processes data solely in data centres located in United Kingdom
The Be Software International website uses cookies, web beacons and other technologies for data analysis and personalisation services.
When you engage in certain activities on this site, Be Software International may ask you to provide certain information about yourself by filling out and submitting an online form.
The types of information we collect automatically include referring sites, browser used, pages visited and other generic measures of user activity.
Be Software International only uses personal information to better understand your needs and interests and to provide you with a more personalised service.

7.3 Processing in the United Kingdom (GBR)

You can request from us information about - How long we retain your personal data
We are permitted to disclose personal information when we have good reason to believe that this is legally required.
Be Software International automatically stores statistical information about your visit.
